description: A look at what stories are trending across the West of England on 4 March 2025
title: Rare mammal spotted and 55 anniversaries in Weston-super-Mare
title_page: Rare mammal spotted and 55 anniversaries in Weston-super-Mare - BBC News
maintext:
There are now bi-folding gates on Eastgate Street in Gloucester, external, which feature the city's coat of arms, according to Gloucestershire Live. They have replaced the bollards there. The gates are due to shut every Friday and Saturday night.
An investigation has begun into how one of the five people found guilty for the murders of Bristol teenagers Max Dixon and Mason Rist in Bristol got hold of a phone to "gloat", external about what happened. That has been reported by ITV West Country.
There is a feature in the Weston Mercury on a Northamptonshire couple celebrating 55 years together â€“ and they spend each anniversary in Weston-super-Mare, external. The seaside town is where they spent their honeymoon.
